description: The Terre et Humanisme Maroc association, founded in 2005, focuses on promoting agroecology and sustainable agriculture in Morocco. With a commitment to respecting all living beings, the initiative trains farmers in sustainable practices, preserves local seeds, and enhances food security. The association also emphasizes education, working with various age groups to foster knowledge about ecological farming. By integrating traditional methods with modern science, it aims to create resilient rural communities and safeguard natural resources.
name: Terre et Humanisme
